page.title: 09INDUSTRIES IN BALLYCLARE
page.content: Kirkpatricks Linron (Ballyclare)Ltd. is one of the largest factories in Ballyclare.It employs about 150 people The factory produces {fibre}and is situated on the Green Road. This road got its name because of the Bleach Green. Another factory in Ballyclare is the Bedford Manufacturing Co.This also is a textile factory,and it employs mostly female workers. They make jeans boilersuits, overalls etc. The factory is situated on the Ballynure Road beside the Police Station. Amblers is another factory which is on the Hillhead Road. It is also a textile factory. It employs both men and women.They work "around the clock" glad to have a job despite the awkward hours!
